recipe_name: Fried baby pineapple with mint and cream
author: Levi Roots
method: Melt the butter in a frying pan and lightly fry the pineapple slices on both sides for 3-4 minutes, or until they start to colour. Transfer the pineapple slices onto a servin g plate, spoon over the double cream and garnish with fresh mint and a wedge of lemon.
